content.question: Based on the provisions from the 1824 Constitution cited in the second paragraph, it can be inferred that

choices.label: the government of Brazil had adopted Enlightenment political principles
Brazilian laws continued to be dictated from Portugal
Brazilian slaves were inspired to seek further rights by the example of the Haitian Revolution
in terms of granting political liberties to its citizens, Brazil was more progressive than most Latin American countries

content.answer: the government of Brazil had adopted Enlightenment political principles
